title: Whitman Mission National Historic Site: While At The Park - Ranger Guided
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip     Ranger Guided     While At The Park - Ranger Guided                  While At The Park - Ranger Guided       While at the park you have some choices for activities. These have to be scheduled before coming. They include indoor and outdoor activities. The indoor activities to choose from when scheduling a field trip are to watch the twenty five minute video with a ranger introductory talk, observe the exhibits in the museum, and have a ranger demonstration. The outdoor activities include walking the trails. The trails have signs beside them to indicate important historical and natural features related to the mission.
